definitions.definition: A small, light vehicle with runners, used recreationally, mostly by children, for sliding down snow-covered hills. (A "sled" in this sense is not pulled by an animal as a "sleigh" is.)
definitions.example: The child zoomed down the hill on his sled.

definitions.definition: A vehicle on runners, used for conveying loads over the snow or ice. (contrast "sleigh", which is larger)
definitions.example: "Mush!" he yelled at the dogs pulling the sled.
